semantics.label: Enable book cover
semantics.description: A cover that shows info regarding the book before access

fields.label: Cover description
fields.description: This text will be the description of your book.

fields.label: Cover media
fields.description: Optional media to display on the cover.

fields.label: Base color
fields.description: Set the base color that will define the overall color scheme of the book. Please ensure a high enough contrast.

fields.label: Display table of contents as default
fields.description: When enabled the table of contents is showed when opening the book

fields.label: Display Progress Indicators
fields.description: When enabled there will be indicators per page showing the user if he is done with the page or not.

fields.label: Enable automatic progress
fields.description: If enabled a page without tasks is considered done when viewed. A page with tasks when all tasks are done. If disabled there will be a button at the bottom of every page for the user to click when done with the page.

fields.label: Display summary
fields.description: When enabled the user can see a summary and submit the progress/answers

fields.label: Enable "Restart" button
fields.description: When enabled the user can initiate a restart on the summary page.

semantics.label: Translation for "@pages of @total completed" (@pages and @total will be replaced by actual values)
Translation for "I have finished this page"
Page progress in book
semantics.description: "@count" will be replaced by page count, and "@total" with the total number of pages

semantics.label: Interaction progress
semantics.description: "@count" will be replaced by interaction count, and "@total" with the total number of interactions

semantics.label: Score
semantics.description: "@score" will be replaced with current score, and "@maxscore" will be replaced with max achievable score

semantics.label: Per page interactions completion
semantics.description: "@left" will be replaced with remaining interactions, and "@max" will be replaced with total number of interactions on the page

semantics.label: Translation for "You have not interacted with any pages."
semantics.default: You have not interacted with any pages.

semantics.label: Translation for "You have to interact with at least one page before you can see the summary."
semantics.default: You have to interact with at least one page before you can see the summary.

semantics.label: Translation for "Your answers are submitted for review!"
semantics.default: Your answers are submitted for review!

fields.label: Page progress textual alternative
fields.description: An alternative text for the visual page progress. @page and @total variables available.
